src:
Se incendiaron galpones de YPF en KM 3

06 Nov 2019, 12:49


Se trata de galpones de la empresa YPF que funcionaban de depósitos, ubicados en inmediaciones del Hospital Alvear que se incendiaron y quedaron prácticamente destruidos.

El incendio comenzó cerca de las 21 de este martes y obligó a trabajar al menos a cinco dotaciones de Bomberos.
El avance de las llamas se agravó por las ráfagas de viento de anoche. En los galpones se depositaban computadoras y muebles.
Los móviles de Bomberos; 45, 47, 48, 49 y 27, junto con personal de seguridad de YPF, Defensa Civil y personal policial trabajaron en el lugar hasta pasadas 23 horas. Se abocaron a remover los escombros y sofocación de las llamas.




Notas Relacionadas
text:
YPF sheds caught fire in KM 3

06 Nov 2019, 12:49


These are warehouses of the YPF company that worked as deposits, located in the immediate vicinity of the Alvear Hospital that caught fire and were virtually destroyed.

The fire began around 9 pm on Tuesday and forced at least five firefighters to work.
The advance of the flames was aggravated by the gusts of wind last night. Computers and furniture were deposited in the sheds.
Firefighters' mobiles; 45, 47, 48, 49 and 27, together with YPF security personnel, Civil Defense and police personnel worked in the place until after 23 hours. They set about removing debris and suffocation of the flames.
